mapper.update: update report_file set report_id = #{reportId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, resource_dir = #{resourceDir,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, report_id, name, type, resource_dir, create_time from report_file
